snippet: Unionized hotel employees have just been offered an additional series of raises that would lift a maid’s annual pay to nearly $70,000 in 10 years.
abstract: Unionized hotel employees in New York City are offered additional series of raises lift a maid’s annual pay to nearly $70,000 in 10 years, from about $50,000 now; New York Hotel and Motel Trades Council contract is extended five years to 2024.
lead_paragraph: Unionized hotel employees have just been offered an additional series of raises that would lift a maid’s annual pay to nearly $70,000 in 10 years.

headline.main: New York City Hotel Workers’ Contract May Grow More Lucrative
headline.print_headline: As City Tourism Booms, Hotel Workers’ Contract May Grow More Lucrative

keywords.value: New York Hotel and Motel Trades Council
keywords.name: organizations
